title: Lumberjack Pile Problem (/r/dailyprogrammer Challenge #217)
caption: For today's challenge the lumberjacks pile their logs from the forest in a grid n x n. Before using us to solve their inventory woes they randomly just put logs in random piles. Currently the pile sizes vary and they want to even them out. So let us help them out.

title: Chess Engine
caption: A chess engine where you can make a computer player in Java and have it compete against other computer players by other people.

title: @channel
caption: The goal of this repo is to replicate the @channel as seen in the anime Steins;Gate. I really love this anime.

title: Kompact
caption: Create and read summarized news articles with Kompact. The API can be used on any web service to generate summaries of text.

title: The MLG-ifier
caption: A chrome extension that will turn those cheeky websites into Reddit 420 blaze it blunts that MLG pros will find euphoric.

title: Tic Tac Toe Engine
caption: A tictactoe engine where you can make a computer player in Java and have it compete against other computer players by other people.

title: Batman on Drugs
caption: Just a fun little app I made overnight. This was inspired by a youtube video that my friend showed me and wished someone would make it into an app you can shake.

title: Polygon Game
caption: An app that my friend and I made for a class. You play as a circle and eat polygons to grow bigger.

title: GPS Coordinate Extractor
caption: iOS app for getting data from areas on a map.

title: Second Post
caption: Ayy this is the second lmao
